message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $95?
Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $105?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. How about we try $98?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we try $102?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think I can do a bit better. How about we try $99?
